pageContent: Purpose: The correlation between glutamine metabolism and oncogene expression in cancers has led to a renewed interest in the role of glutamine in cancer cell survival. Hyperpolarized [5-(13) C]glutamine is evaluated as a potential biomarker for noninvasive metabolic measurements of drug response in prostate cancer cells.

metaData.source:
Finding help for sexual problems after prostate cancer treatment: a phone survey of men's and women's perspectives
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12833559/
